page.title: 11MEDICAL PROVISIONS
page.content: Within the whole of our "block"there is not a single doctor's surgery, and this means people have to travel to Stockton,Billingham or Norton to visit a doctor. Very recently a dental surgeon has set up in practice within close proximity to the school and in addition a private Nuffield{hospital has been established off Junction Road.Also there is an{Old People's {Home,}both day care and residential patients,close to our school. To look after our{health}and keep a watchful eye on us{school nurses}and doctors pay regular visits to school.Among other things we have our sight tested, teeth and scalp inspected and our general health observed. Our teachers often remind us of foods to eat and how to look after our bodies in order to stay healthy.
